title: HELP ME
body:
Help me get to silver again i get put the every new season and end back in in bronze just need a puck me up! Ffs i acnt take it anymore!! Rhiirhii

I am good check my stats just swolled by unco teams and trolls!!

ADC/ JNG MAIN ROLES

replies.body:
Hello Rhii, I had a look through your match history.
Just a quick look.

When you played morgana last time, you rushed a sightstone + Queens claim so GJ.
However.... You got no Armor VS an all ad team.
Try getting a frozen Heart next time, for Armor, Mana, and Cooldown reduction.
And you didn't itemize appropriately.

Your Miss foutune games, both 40 mins each.
you have really poor CS for a 40+ min game as a marksman.
So you should work on that.
And you have died alot, so work on NOT dying. CS is worth more to you in teh start to mid game.
It doesn't matter how low they got or were, 2.5 Minoins waves = 1 Kill.

This was an issue in alot of games.
And the talon games, Poor CS for a talon, and negative or almost flat even KDA.

----------------------------------------------

Work on CSing about 80 Minions per 10 mins.
That's the minimal, and try not to die as much, the less deaths you have the less gold they earn.

-----------------------------------------------
80 minions per 10 min? Wow i thought it was 70. 80 minions is a bit harder to get and maintain especially at his elo.

Getting fed doesn't win you games if you don't know how to carry. Looking at your warwick and shyv builds i'm not surprised you're stuck in bronze. Doesnt matter how fed you are if you go full damage on a melee champ and the enemies can just oneshot you every time you go in lategame.
